transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22
report my name is dave and this is
episode 1122 a and today's date is
november eighth 2016 and the thought of
the episode is the financial nightmare
begins after the election let's get into
the economic collapse financial news now
today on election day we see the stock
market up yesterday we saw the market
was up by 300 points they wanted to get
that market over 18,000 to make the
economy look really great and we can see
that this whole entire illusion that
we're in is created to convince everyone
that the economy is doing well that we
need to keep the establishment running
the economy and there's nothing wrong
but we've been looking at so many
different economic indicators and let me
just say there are so many of them
pointing to a complete recession /
depression into a major collapse and
there are major financial pundants there
are major financial individuals who are
continually saying that this system
right now it is completely falling apart
and at everything that we looked at and
everything that we dive into and we rip
apart what the government is telling us
we see that the entire system is ready
to implode and we can see right now that
the labor market is ready to roll over
hiring is below 2014 levels and there
are more and more job openings out there
and I explained what these job openings
are where a lot of companies what they
do is they keep the jobs open they make
it seem like they're going to be hiring
and then they put all these requirements
into what the job is and most most of
the people can't even fit into these
jobs because it's completely impossible
and what we're seeing right now is that
the entire labor market where all the
people that have fallen off where we
have all the manipulated unemployment
numbers well it is completely rolling
over and this is despite near record
number of job openings the pace of
hiring has failed to keep up with the
number of job openings that we are
seeing today and we can see right now
that this is done on purpose this is
part of the illusion that the economy is
doing fine because what the government
central bankers do they instruct the
corporation's to continually put out job
openings make the requirements very very
difficult and never fill the jobs this
is what we've been seeing and actually
right after 2008 2009 2010 we saw the
same thing there were a lot of job
openings but nobody was hiring going
throughout this entire recovery as the
government calls it we've seen the same
thing a lot of job openings but not a
lot of companies hiring and if we look
back to a year ago we can see hirings
right now are down by one percent and
what's more interesting than that is
that if we look at payrolls and we look
at job hires well guess what they're
both declining when did we see this once
before well we saw this back in two
thousand eight where all of a sudden
payrolls started to decline job hiring
starting to decline and we went into
freefall and the whole thing just kept
on tumbling and tumbling down non-stop
and this is what we're seeing once again
we're actually following the same exact
pattern we see right now that student
loans
auto loans they have hit an all-time new
high of 2.5 trillion dollars we see
consumer credit has jumped by 19 billion
and of course we expect this to happen
because the central bankers their job is
to blow up bubbles their job is to
create more debt and this is what
they've been doing and we can see right
now that revolving debt is increasing
but when we look at this very closely
and we look at consumer debt we see that
the government is responsible for most
of it that's the primary source of this
debt when we look at student loans and
auto loans well they just continually
move up and up and up and this is
exactly what the central bankers want
because they deal in debt and we can see
from everything that we've been looking
at when we look at all these economic
indicators and we put them all together
and we create this picture we can see
that we are doing the same thing that
we've done back in two thousand eight
but this time the indicators are the
same as two thousand eight or much worse
and in many cases they are so bad that
we are not in a recession we're
teetering on a complete depression
collapse scenario and we can see that
the entire economy was held together to
create this illusion for the elections
to create the illusion that everything
is fine because we know what they're
going to plan out here we know that
after the elections when everything's
all said and done this economy's going
to come tumbling down now is going to be
the next day or the day after that no
most likely not I think what they're
going to do once they have their
candidate depending on who it is if it's
Trump I believe they're going to bring
it down quickly to say this is the
reason why it's happening because he is
going to become president and all of a
sudden the economy just drops down we
enter war he
has to deal with all this if he makes it
through all of this if it's Hillary
Clinton I think they're going to wait
until after January most likely in the
spring where they'll probably start to
bring everything down everything to
start to crash because they will not be
able to hold this together and we can
see right now that this will all be
blamed most likely on Russia because we
see they're pointing their fingers at
Russia at this point for cyber attacking
which they have no proof this is all
complete propaganda this is fitting into
their entire false flag narrative but we
can see right now that once these
elections are over and there's the
change of the guard depending on who it
is it's go time they are ready to bring

say listen we're bringing in a new

down the economy was doing fine and they
